body.p:
New York City
May 24th/62
Hon. B Magoffin
Frankfort Ky.
My dear sir,
I will be under very many obligations to you if you will appoint Watson J. Hildreth Esqr of this city a Commissioner of deeds for Kentucky.
I know Mr H well and he is honest capable and faithful.

If you make the appointment send it to him care of Cowles Watson & Townsend 290 Broadway N.Y. and he will forward
ward the fees.
I sail for Europe in a few days.

I am, my dear sir,
very truly
yr obt servant
A. M. Hancock

New York
Comr. of Deeds
W. J. Hildreth
(City)
Com Issd May 29th 1862.
